channel.title: Eclipse IDE question
channel.description:
hi guys,
i want to know the buttonid of a button in my server, i've heard that you can acquire the buttonid when you're in the eclipse debug mode, but i can't get it working. can someone tell me how/where i can see the buttonid in eclipse IDE (debug mode)
thanks,
startcode
